ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: This is the city of Zarahemla, the Nephite capital.

ai_sprite.name: villager2
ai_sprite.dialog: You must recruit stronger warlords if you want the final victory.

ai_sprite.name: yuppie
ai_sprite.dialog: Nehor shouldn't be punished. He was just defending himself. Man, I'm broke.

ai_sprite.name: woman
ai_sprite.dialog: Nehor is likely at Hermounts, to the north. That's where his church was founded.

ai_sprite.name: advisor
ai_sprite.dialog: The Order of the Nehors has followers in all the surrounding cities, even here in Zarahemla.
